info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Swain and northeastern Graham Counties through 145 AM EDT... At 100 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Robbinsville, or near Fontana Lake, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bryson City, Fontana Lake, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Deep Creek, Luada, Wesser, Stecoah, Almond and Alarka. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
